title: Presence Typo
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822042151/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822042151/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Présence Typo**

Foundry of French designer [Thierry Puyfoulhoux](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822042151/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thierry%20Puyfoulhoux).

URL: [http://www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822042151/http:/www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html "http://www.presencetypo.com/Pages-html/home.html")  
Interview: [http://typographica.org/2007/on-typography/interview-type-designer-thier...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822042151/http:/typographica.org/2007/on-typography/interview-type-designer-thierry-puyfoulhoux/ "http://typographica.org/2007/on-typography/interview-type-designer-thierry-puyfoulhoux/")
author: paul d hunt
